name: 円香
text: ……観たまま書いてどうすんの
trans:
...What are you doing, writing what you're watching
as is.

name: 円香
text:
ダメなんじゃない
自分の言葉で話せる人を求めてるんだから
trans:
It's not wrong. But the show is looking for someone
that can speak from their own perpective.

name: 円香
text:
うちらが受けるオーディション
元々このドラマが好きな人も集まるだろうし
trans:
Not to mention that this audition will probably attract
entries of those who already liked this drama.

name: 円香
text: ……今更観始めてる時点で付け焼き刃なんだけど
trans:
...Even though our understanding of it might be
superficial since we just started watching,

name: 円香
text:
事前アンケートくらいは
その辺上手くごまかした方がいいんじゃない？
trans:
Wouldn't it be better if we just come up with a good
and vague answer, since it's just a pre-audition
survey?

name: 円香
text: ……取り敢えず最後まで観ない？
trans: ...Anyways, let's just finish the drama for now?

name: 円香
text: ……うちらがトーク番組のゲストなんて
trans: ...Can't imagine us being guests for a talk show.

name: 透
text:
アピールしたいんだって
うちらのトーク
trans:
I want to appeal to everyone.
To show that our talk,

name: 円香
text:
……知ってる
一緒に聞いてた
trans:
...I know.
I was there with you when we asked.

name: 円香
text:
別に反発してるわけじゃないから
だから観るんでしょ、こうやって
trans:
It's not as if I'm against doing it.
That's why we're watching it, like this.

name: 透
text:
晩ごはんどうするかって
お母さんが
trans:
Whatcha planning for dinner,
My mom's asking.

name: 円香
trans:
...Nah, I'm fine.
I'm about to head home already.

name: 円香
text: 明日には観終わるでしょ
trans: We can probably finish watching it tomorrow.

name: 透
text:
観ちゃえばいいじゃん
今日
trans: We can just watch it, today.

name: 透
text: じゃあ、いるってことで
trans: Then I'll reply that you'll be staying over.

name: 円香
text:
どうせ隣だし
準備したらまた来る
trans:
My house is next door anyways.
I'll come back after getting ready.

name: 透
text:
なんか、もらってさ
魚、いっぱい
trans:
Apparently, we received fish.
A lot of it.

name: 透
text:
それ
樋口に食べさせたいんだって
trans: Mom wants you to have some too.

name: 透
trans: Freshness is most important, all that.

name: 円香
text: ……それじゃあ、お言葉に甘えて
trans: ...Alright, I'll take her up for the offer.

name: 透
text:
樋口ー
パジャマー

name: 透
text:
ここ
置いとくねー

name: 透
text:
魚
樋口んちの分ー
trans:
Fish.
A portion for your familyー

name: 透
text:
渡しといたからー
樋口ママに
trans:
My mom passed some overー
To your mom.

name: off
text: 今まで忘れられていたように
trans: As if I've forgotten it until now

name: off
text: 私がアイドルでいる以上は
trans: As long as I'm an idol
